body: Brill.js ======== Brill.js is a library that works with the DOM and server. It also comes with Brill.css and themes.css. The css files are still under progress, so don't use them. To install it with npm, write npm install brill.js How to use it ============ To start using it, make a variable called app (or whatever you want). Inside app, write this: new Brill([]); You can put anything you want in that array. It will just get returned.To make a get request(please say if this doesn't work) write app.get("/path",callback()); It should work. The code is in brill.js. Make a pull request if you have any improvements. In v1, there is a number of functions. To use the map function, simply write app.map(callback); You really should look in the library. If you have any ideas or improvements, please comment or make a pull request.
